MBTI WORLD ANIMATION
Base URL: https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev
Primary language: ko-KR
Secondary language: en-US

Summary:
- Story-driven MBTI personality tests inspired by animation worlds.
- Each test has 16 scenario-based questions.
- Results provide MBTI type interpretation and character matching.

Important URLs:
- Home (KO): https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/
- Home (EN): https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/en
- Test Select (KO): https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/select
- Test Select (EN): https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/en/select
- Sitemap: https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/robots.txt
- Privacy (KO): https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/privacy
- Privacy (EN): https://mbti-world-animation.pages.dev/en/privacy

Notes:
- Content is entertainment and self-reflection oriented.
- MBTI outcomes are not medical or clinical diagnosis.
